message: Let's start fair. I propose 60 for me and 40 for you.  What do you think?
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's split it a little more evenly this time. I propose I take $55 and you take $45.
Since my offer was too high last time, let's try a straight 50/50 split.  It's the fairest way to go, and avoids any further haggling with inflation.
